name: Burning Panic!
description:
Don't panic! This little duck needs your help to reach a water pond to save his life! It has already panicked so it won't make it by itself.

Burning Panic! is a 2D platformer where you have to reach a water pond to save a duck's life, this game requires player's ability to coordinate their actions in order to avoid obstacles

This game was made for #minijam in only 3 days using no premade assets

Credits:

MoosDruide13 / Fire duck (Programming)
https://moosdruide13.itch.io

https://zirok.itch.io

Eric Matyas (Music)
https://soundimage.org

Zapsplat.com (SFX)

NO DUCKS WERE HARMED DURING THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS GAME
